meanings.definition: A person or thing that rewinds something, such as a tape or film.
meanings.sent1: The rewinder quickly fixed the tangled tape.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy a new rewinder for my old VHS tapes.
meanings.sent3: The little robot claimed to be a magical rewinder of memories.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a rewinder, bringing back joyful moments.
meanings.sent5: The rewinder hummed as it spun the film back to the beginning.

meanings.definition: A machine used to rewind something, such as a spool of thread or a film reel.
meanings.sent1: The rewinder at the textile factory worked tirelessly all day.
meanings.sent2: Don't forget to use the rewinder before returning the film reel.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the thread rewinder was a toy for chasing.
meanings.sent4: The old clock seemed like a rewinder, always going back in time.
meanings.sent5: The rewinder whirred as it wound the thread back onto the spool.
